attributes.action: reject proposals for the "three strike" illegal web download system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These proposals do not take into account the fact that innocent people whose computers have been hijacked (zombots) will be criminalised. It is also unenforceable due to the vast numbers using illegal services and the ingenuity of the pirates. Finally, the programmes to monitor the downloads would further restrict and disrupt the broadband in this country and provide a viral gateway, compromising many law-abiding citizens' internet access.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
